sub_title: Architect with over 20 years experience in conceptualising landmark designs in Europe, Asia, America and the Middle East.
summary:
Born in 1971, Alain Fouraux is a dutch architect/ inventor/ entrepreneur with an extensive experience in architecture, manufacturing and startups.

Upon achieving his Master of Architecture degree at Delft University of Technology in 1999, Alain Fouraux joined Rem Koolhaas office OMA in Rotterdam.
At OMA, Alain has developed a broad oeuvre of award winning architectural designs, ranging from flagship stores for Prada to the CCTV headquarters in Beijing, awarded best high rise building worldwide in 2012. Alain has been co-responsible for the creation of over 60 OMA projects in the past 18 years as design director of OMA’s Rotterdam based headquarters. 
Selected highlights, CCTV headquarters, Shenzhen Stock Exchange, Nhow Amsterdam Rai Hotel, Axel Springer campus Berlin, Rijnstraat 8 Denhaag, Prada Flagshipstore NYC.

Between 2001 and 2019 Alain has spent 12 years living and working in China. Having lived and worked in Beijing, Shanghai, Shenzhen, Guangzhou, Chengdu and Hong Kong Alain has a mastered a thorough understanding of Chinese language and cultural nuances throughout the country.

In this period Alain gets involved with product design and manufacturing alongside his work in architecture. In 2016 Alain opens and runs his own factory in Shenzhen, manufacturing transparent LED displays in curtain wall facades, www.mediaskin.net. Here Alain masters the ins and outs of manufacturing, that in addition to his architectural skills forms the foundation of FIX. 

In 2020 Alain co-founds FIX. A Rotterdam based startup, that designs and manufactures environmentally friendly houses. 
FIX aspires a way of building and living that is symbiotic and regenerative instead of pollutive and parasitic.
Our houses are affordable, circular and energy and carbon neutral. FIX houses are made in Holland.

profile_positions.description:
FIX is a startup that wants to unlock the construction industry with affordable environmentally friendly houses. We take construction out of the age of the construction worker into the age of eco-industry.
Our houses are not built on a construction site, but in a factory with the latest green-technologies. Reducing construction time from years to months. Offering high quality architecture on a budget. 
Our houses are affordable, circular and energy and carbon neutral.
FIX is part of startup incubator YES!Delft.

profile_positions.description: Mediaskin is a transparant LED display technology that allows content to coexist with architecture. Architecture no longer has to be a static composition of steel, glass and concrete. With mediaskin architecture becomes a dynamic tool for communication with its environment, without compromising it's original functionality.
